Package Leaves.Repository

Class LeavesRepository

java.lang.Object
Abstract.Repository<Leave>
Leaves.Repository.LeavesRepository
public class LeavesRepository extends Repository<Leave>
Repository class for managing leave data. The `LeavesRepository` class extends the abstract `Repository` to handle CRUD operations for `Leave` entities.
